Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting owners of commercial premises from knowingly leasing commercial premises to unlicensed cannabis sellers and requiring the sheriff to produce a monthly report on enforcement relating to unlicensed cannabis sellers
